snippet: Gunfire in the parking lot at Hazard Community and Technical College wounded a third victim, the authorities said.
abstract: Gunman firing into vehicle kills two people and wounds teenager in the parking lot of Hazard Community and Technical College in Hazard, Ky.
lead_paragraph: Gunfire in the parking lot at Hazard Community and Technical College wounded a third victim, the authorities said.

headline.seo: 2 Dead in Shooting at Hazard, Ky., College
headline.main: Gunman Kills 2 at College in Eastern Kentucky
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills 2 at College in Eastern Kentucky
